headline: Is Vertiv (VRT) Using the Hut 8 AI Project to Redefine Its High‑End Data Center Edge?
summary: In December 2025, Hut 8 Corp. announced it had engaged Jacobs Solutions as its EPCM partner, working in collaboration with Vertiv, to develop what it aims to position as a benchmark AI infrastructure project with tightly managed safety, quality, and delivery timelines. This collaboration highlights Vertiv’s role at the center of increasingly complex, high-end AI data center builds where integrated power, cooling, and program management capabilities are becoming critical for demanding...
